Name: Name
DropImageHere: Drop image for skill here or click to choose an image
ThereAreInvalidSnippets: There are invalid snippets because the associated placeholders have been deleted from the template. They will not be exported.
NoExportSnippetExist: No export snippets exist for this object. You have to add export snippets to the template using the export snippets placeholders to use this function.
DeleteSnippetToolTip: Click here to delete the snippet
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheExportSnippe: Are you sure you want to delete the export snippet?
AreYouSureYouWantToExportUnsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. The export will reflect an old state. Are you sure you want to export the old state?
MarkedInMapNTimes: Skill is marked in the map {{0}} times. No zoom on marker is possible.
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheObject: Are you sure you want to delete the skill?
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete the template?
AreYouSureYouWantToRegenerateTheLanguage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the language keys? This can be useful if the name of the object was changed for example.
DeletingThisTemplateWillAlsoDeleteExport: If you delete this template the associated export template will also be deleted. The skill default export template will be used in this case.
ExistingLanguageKeysWillChange: If the language keys are regenerated the existing keys can change. Existing translations might need to be changed.
LockedTemplatePrefix: The template is currently being edited by
LockedObjectPrefix: The skill is currently being edited by
